item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Futures Fall
item.description: U.S. stock futures retreated while global markets were mixed.

item.title: My friend declared bankruptcy. Can creditors still go after him for child support, back taxes and student debt?
item.description: “Most of those old debts are credit-card debts.”

item.title: Sterling Rises Against Euro on French Politics
item.description: Sterling rose to a one-and-a-half week high against the euro on the prospect of the French government facing a no-confidence vote over its fiscal tigh...

item.title: French stocks and bonds hit by budget and no-confidence fears
item.description: French stocks and bonds were hit on Monday on worries the country’s government may fall.

item.title: Stellantis’ shares drop after Carlos Tavares’ sudden exit as CEO
item.description: Stellantis’ indicated Carlos Tavares’ views had become misaligned with those held by the company’s board and shareholders
